channel.title: Katrine Miller on Latvian songs ABC notation
channel.description: Recent content in Katrine Miller on Latvian songs ABC notation

item.title: Beaten Down
item.description: [Verse 1] Don't say a word Hear your heart Feel the life running through you Here we are standing still You make a feel so much harder [Chorus] Beaten down, ripped out Broken million times Fell in love, felt pain Things will never feel the same When things makes sense, the world breaks down But in the end it's love, we're fine and full All we have burned down You don't know how it hurts Fell in love, felt pain Things will never feel the same But in the end, it's all worth fighting for [Verse 2] Close your eyes Take a breath Feel the love running through you Here we are moving fast You make a feel so much harder [Chorus] Beaten down, ripped out Broken million times Fell in love, felt pain Things will never feel the same When things makes sense, the world breaks down But in the end it's love, we're fine and full All we have burned down You don't know how it hurts Fell in love, felt pain Things will never feel the same But in the end, it's all worth fighting for [Break] (Ah-ah-ah) (Ooh-ooh-ooh) [Chorus] Beaten down, ripped out Broken million times Fell in love, felt pain Things will never feel the same When things makes sense, the world breaks down But in the end it's love, we're fine and full All we have burned down You don't know how it hurts Fell in love, felt pain Things will never feel the same But in the end, it's all worth fighting for
